effects: Physical damage (2.5x, ATK) to one enemy

Gain access to following skills:
	Bootshine+2 (704290)
	Snap Punch+2 (704260)

Gain 5 uses of the following skills for one turn:
	Snap Punch+2 (704260)
Reduce DEF and SPR by 40% for 8 turns to one enemy
name: Snap Punch

desc_short.0: Damage and reduce DEF and SPR for one enemy, enable perfect balance, and enable snap punch or bootshine to be used once
desc_short.5: Daña y reduce la DEF y el ESP de un enemigo, aprende Equilibrio exquisito y puede usar Puño resquebrajador o Ultracombo una vez
